index_terms: SEATTLE KING COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC HEALTH
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle-King County Department of Public Health; amending various sections of Chapters 3.30, 3.60, 5.78, 6.430, 9.25, 10.01, 10.03, 10.10, 10.13, 10.18, 10.24, 10.25, 10.26, 10.54, 10.56, 10.72, 10.76, 21.08, 21.12, 21.16, 21.36, 21.43, 22.801, 22.900G, 23.50, 23.60, 23.57, 23.69, 25.06, and 25.10 of the Seattle Municipal Code ('SMC') to change its name to "Public Health -- Seattle and King County"; adopting and authorizing execution of a new interlocal agreement between the City of Seattle and King County entitled '2011 King County/City of Seattle Interlocal Agreement Regarding Public Health -- Seattle & King County', and repealing Ordinance 118377, the prior interlocal agreement between the City of Seattle and King County entitled 'SKCDPH Health Interlocal Agreement'; and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts.
committee: Housing, Human Services, Health, and Culture
